video_effects.name: ken_burns_zoom_in
video_effects.description: Slow zoom in effect, creates depth and focus
video_effects.use_case: Portrait photos, close-up shots, emotional moments
video_effects.technical: Gradual scale increase from 1.0 to 1.2 over duration

video_effects.name: ken_burns_zoom_out
video_effects.description: Slow zoom out effect, reveals more context
video_effects.use_case: Landscape photos, group shots, establishing shots
video_effects.technical: Gradual scale decrease from 1.2 to 1.0 over duration

video_effects.name: pan_left
video_effects.description: Horizontal pan from right to left
video_effects.use_case: Wide photos, panoramic shots, travel photos
video_effects.technical: Horizontal movement from right edge to left edge

video_effects.name: pan_right
video_effects.description: Horizontal pan from left to right
video_effects.use_case: Wide photos, panoramic shots, travel photos
video_effects.technical: Horizontal movement from left edge to right edge

video_effects.name: static
video_effects.use_case: Portrait photos, detailed shots, important moments

video_effects.name: zoom_in_center
video_effects.use_case: Portrait photos, detailed shots, emotional moments

video_effects.name: zoom_out_center
video_effects.use_case: Group photos, landscape shots, context revealing

transitions.name: fade_in
transitions.use_case: Opening shots, dramatic moments, emotional scenes
transitions.technical: Opacity transition from 0 to 1 over 1 second

transitions.name: fade_out
transitions.use_case: Closing shots, dramatic moments, emotional scenes
transitions.technical: Opacity transition from 1 to 0 over 1 second

transitions.name: crossfade
transitions.use_case: Seamless transitions, related photos, story flow
transitions.technical: Opacity blend between clips over 0.5 seconds

transitions.name: slide_left
transitions.description: Slide in from right, slide out to left
transitions.use_case: Dynamic transitions, action shots, energetic moments
transitions.technical: Horizontal position transition from right to left

transitions.name: slide_right
transitions.description: Slide in from left, slide out to right
transitions.use_case: Dynamic transitions, action shots, energetic moments
transitions.technical: Horizontal position transition from left to right

transitions.name: zoom_transition
transitions.use_case: Dynamic transitions, action shots, energetic moments

transitions.name: dissolve
transitions.use_case: Gentle transitions, romantic moments, soft scenes

music_styles.name: nostalgic
music_styles.use_case: Family photos, childhood memories, sentimental moments
music_styles.technical: Slow tempo, warm tones, emotional progression

music_styles.name: upbeat
music_styles.technical: Fast tempo, bright tones, energetic rhythm

music_styles.name: romantic
music_styles.description: Soft, romantic music for intimate moments
music_styles.use_case: Couple photos, romantic moments, intimate scenes
music_styles.technical: Moderate tempo, soft tones, romantic progression

music_styles.name: energetic
music_styles.description: High-energy music for action and excitement
music_styles.use_case: Sports photos, action shots, exciting moments
music_styles.technical: Very fast tempo, dynamic tones, energetic rhythm

music_styles.name: calm
music_styles.description: Peaceful, relaxing music for serene moments
music_styles.use_case: Nature photos, peaceful moments, relaxing scenes
music_styles.technical: Slow tempo, soft tones, peaceful progression

music_styles.name: dramatic
music_styles.description: Intense, dramatic music for powerful moments
music_styles.use_case: Important events, dramatic moments, powerful scenes
music_styles.technical: Variable tempo, dynamic tones, dramatic progression
